TopicTitle: MK4 BIPEDAL MECH - climbing some hills in the desert - raw footage (24min)

Articles.Content: "looks like parallax's" you say? No idea what you're talking about..
my god, I love that WALKER!!
.... Why do I suddenly feel like the Empire contracted out to KSC for it's AT-STs?

"looks like parallax's" you say? No idea what you're talking about..

http://i.imgur.com/KmFy1jf.png

I don't see any resemblance

I thought you'd enjoy that. I haven't tried the script out yet but this thing is even more awesome in person. Wayyy bigger than I expected it to be. I really want you to take another crack at my t-rex but the IR is broken in .23.5. You still have .23 loaded anywhere? I spent a long time making it run smoother by doing what you said and removing a bunch of stuff.

There's still polygons to remove but m1sz said it was much better already
I dunno what youre talking about man, im running 23.5 with IR working perfectly. I even tested your dinobot with it a while ago.

I think you should give it small arms on the front and some grappling hooks it'd be really cool to see this thing lean down and pick up a car or something. I have this image of Sebulba in my mind when I see this awesome creation.
